title: Looking for Top, jg and mid laner
body:
Hi, looking for a top, mid and jg to join clash team add me 'RL2328', pref silver+,
can join discord  https://discord.gg/WxxznpW, also make sure you have a working mic or form of voice communication.

replies.body:
Hi I play Jg Gold 3 Jg Main with 60 per cent win rate on lee sin 

IGN: BoostedMonkey69 

happy to join
I play All roles but currently playing mid - Gold 2 - IGN: YankInKiwiCloths

That discord link is already expired, but if you'll have me,
IGN: Nightjar, Gold 3/4 (flex/solo)
I can play Top/Jungle/Sup competently and I can fill the other roles with a few champions. I normally queue 'Fill'.
